subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Torres, who posted an 8.44 earned run average in spring training, has bounced back with a 0.51 E.R.A. in 10 appearances with the Mets.
snippet: Carlos Torres, who posted an 8.44 earned run average in spring training, has bounced back with a 0.51 E.R.A. in 10 appearances with the Mets.
